message.content:
Here's a healthy meal plan for you with the given ingredients for seven days:

Day 1:
Breakfast: Overnight oats with almond milk, chia seeds, and fresh berries
- 1/2 cup rolled oats
- 1 cup unsweetened almond milk
- 1 tbsp chia seeds
- Handful of mixed berries (strawberries, blueberries, raspberries)
- Drizzle of maple syrup instead of honey
- Toppings: pistachios and cashews

Lunch: Quinoa salad with grilled chicken breast
- 1 cup cooked quinoa
- Grilled chicken breast
- Chopped veggies (cucumber, bell peppers, tomatoes, red onion)
- Lemon vinaigrette dressing
- Handful of spinach
- Sliced almonds for crunch

Dinner: Stir fry with tofu and vegetables
- 1 block firm tofu
- Broccoli, carrots, snap peas, mushrooms, bell peppers
- Coconut aminos instead of soy sauce
- Brown rice

Day 2:
Breakfast: Scrambled tofu with spinach and tomatoes
- 1 block firm tofu
- Handful of baby spinach
- Diced tomatoes
- Seasoned with turmeric, black pepper, salt
- Toppings: pistachios

Lunch: Lentil salad
- 1 cup cooked lentils
- Chopped veggies (carrots, cucumber, celery)
- Dressing: olive oil and lemon juice
- Handful of sunflower seeds

Dinner: Zoodles with pesto sauce
- Spiralized zucchini noodles
- Pine nut pesto sauce (made with basil, cashews, garlic alternative - sub with onion or shallots)
- Cherry tomatoes

Day 3:
Breakfast: Smoothie bowl
- Frozen banana, almond milk
- Handful of spinach
- Sliced strawberries
- Toppings: pistachios and cashews

Lunch: Lentil soup
- 1 cup cooked lentils
- Chopped carrots, celery
- Drizzle of olive oil
- Handful of almonds

Dinner: Tofu stir fry with vegetables
- 1 block firm tofu
- Broccoli, bok choy, mushrooms
- Sesame seeds for crunch

Day 4:
Breakfast: Avocado toast
- Whole grain bread
- Mashed avocado
- Salt and pepper
- Toppings: pistachios and cashews

Lunch: Quinoa salad with roasted veggies
- 1 cup cooked quinoa
- Roasted broccoli, bell peppers, red onion
- Balsamic vinaigrette dressing
- Handful of almonds

Dinner: Veggie curry
- Chickpeas
- Cauliflower, spinach, peas
- Coconut milk instead of yogurt (dairy free)

Day 5:
Breakfast: Oatmeal with almond butter and banana
- 1/2 cup oats
- 1 tbsp almond butter
- Sliced banana
- Toppings: pistachios

Lunch: Lentil salad
- 1 cup cooked lentils
- Chopped veggies (cucumber, red onion)
- Dressing: olive oil and lemon juice
- Handful of sunflower seeds

Dinner: Veggie stir fry with tofu
- 1 block firm tofu
- Bok choy, snap peas, carrots
- Sesame seeds for crunch

Day 6:
Breakfast: Fruit salad
- Mixed berries
- Drizzle of maple syrup instead of honey
- Toppings: pistachios and cashews

Lunch: Quinoa bowl with chickpeas
- 1 cup cooked quinoa
- Chopped veggies (cucumber, red onion)
- Dressing: olive oil and lemon juice
- Handful of almonds

Dinner: Zoodles with pesto sauce
- Spiralized zucchini noodles
- Pine nut pesto sauce (made with sunflower seeds instead of cashews)
- Cherry tomatoes

Day 7:
Breakfast: Smoothie bowl
- Frozen mango, almond milk
- Handful of spinach
- Toppings: pistachios and cashews

Lunch: Lentil soup
- 1 cup cooked lentils
- Chopped carrots, celery
- Drizzle of olive oil
- Handful of almonds

Dinner: Tofu stir fry with vegetables
- 1 block firm tofu
- Broccoli, snap peas
- Sesame seeds for crunch

Please note that the meal plan is just a suggestion and can be adjusted according to your taste preferences. You may replace or add other ingredients as per your liking while keeping in mind of your restrictions.
